languages.text: "Да. Я готова! Попрошу лишь об одном, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. Если мне будет дозволено, я хочу посетить хранилище священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} и преклонить колени перед реликвией, которой касался сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}. Нам предстоит серьезный разговор... и я хочу помолиться перед святыней прежде, чем открою душу".

traits.locale_text: "Да. Я готова! Попрошу лишь об одном, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. Если мне будет дозволено, я хочу посетить хранилище священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} и преклонить колени перед реликвией, которой касался сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}. Нам предстоит серьезный разговор... и я хочу помолиться перед святыней прежде, чем открою душу".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and kneel before the relic touched by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."
languages.original_text: "Да. Я готова! Попрошу лишь об одном, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “是的，我已经准备好了！我只请求一件事情，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。如果可以的话，我希望能看看保存神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}的房间，跪在由{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}本人触碰过的圣物前。这会是一场艰难的对话……我希望在将我的灵魂表露无遗之前，能先在圣物旁边祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and kneel before the relic touched by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."

traits.locale_text: “是的，我已经准备好了！我只请求一件事情，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。如果可以的话，我希望能看看保存神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}的房间，跪在由{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}本人触碰过的圣物前。这会是一场艰难的对话……我希望在将我的灵魂表露无遗之前，能先在圣物旁边祈祷。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, Rogue Trader. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred Warrant and kneel before the relic touched by the Emperor Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."

languages.text: «¡Sí, estoy lista! Solo quisiera pedirle una cosa, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Si me lo permite, me gustaría ver la cámara de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y arrodillarme ante semejante reliquia, tocada por el propio {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Nos espera una conversación difícil... y quiero rezar ante la reliquia antes de revelar mi alma».
languages.original_text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and kneel before the relic touched by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí, estoy lista! Solo quisiera pedirle una cosa, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Si me lo permite, me gustaría ver la cámara de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y arrodillarme ante semejante reliquia, tocada por el propio {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Nos espera una conversación difícil... y quiero rezar ante la reliquia antes de revelar mi alma».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「準備はできている！{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}よ 1つだけ頼みがある。よければ神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}部屋を 見せていただきたい。そして{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}陛下が触れられた聖遺物の前に跪きたいのだ。これからは困難な会話が待ち受けている…魂をさらけ出す前に、遺物の前で祈りを捧げたい」
languages.original_text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and kneel before the relic touched by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."

traits.locale_text: 「準備はできている！{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}よ 1つだけ頼みがある。よければ神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}部屋を 見せていただきたい。そして{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}陛下が触れられた聖遺物の前に跪きたいのだ。これからは困難な会話が待ち受けている…魂をさらけ出す前に、遺物の前で祈りを捧げたい」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Ich bin bereit! Ich bitte Euch nur um eines, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}. Dürfte ich vielleicht die Kammer des heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} sehen und vor dem Relikt niederknien, welches der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} selbst berührt hat? Eine schwierige Unterhaltung liegt vor uns ... Und ich möchte zu dem Relikt beten, ehe ich meine Seele entblöße."
languages.original_text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and kneel before the relic touched by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Ich bin bereit! Ich bitte Euch nur um eines, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}. Dürfe ich vielleicht die Kammer des heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} sehen und vor dem Relikt niederknien, welches der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} selbst berührt hat? Eine schwierige Unterhaltung liegt vor uns ... Und ich möchte zu dem Relikt beten, ehe ich meine Seele entblöße."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui. Je suis prête ! Mais je voudrais d'abord vous demander quelque chose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Si vous y consentez, j'aimerais voir la salle de la sainte {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} et m'agenouiller devant la relique touchée par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} Lui-même. C'est une discussion difficile qui s'annonce... et je souhaite prier devant la relique avant de mettre mon âme à nu. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and kneel before the relic touched by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Je suis prête ! Mais je voudrais d'abord vous demander quelque chose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Si vous y consentez, j'aimerais voir la salle de la sainte {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} et m'agenouiller devant la relique touchée par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} Lui-même. C'est une discussion difficile qui s'annonce... et je souhaite prier devant la relique avant de mettre mon âme à nu. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Evet. Artık hazırım! Fakat {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, senden tek bir ricam olacak. Mümkünse kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'nin{/g} bulunduğu odayı görmek ve {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri'nin bizzat dokunduğu yadigârın önünde eğilmek isterim. Önümüzde çetin bir musahabe var... İçimi dökmeden evvel yadigârın huzurunda dua etmeyi arzuluyorum."
languages.original_text: "Yes. I'm ready! I would ask only one thing of you, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. If I may, I would like to see the chamber of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and kneel before the relic touched by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself. A difficult conversation lies ahead of us... and I wish to pray by the relic before I lay my soul bare."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Artık hazırım! Fakat {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, senden tek bir ricam olacak. Mümkünse kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'nin bulunduğu odayı görmek ve {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri'nin bizzat dokunduğu yadigârın önünde eğilmek isterim. Önümüzde çetin bir musahabe var... İçimi dökmeden evvel yadigârın huzurunda dua etmektir arzum."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
